text: Hi, Im trying to get people to donate to Save the Children, can I tell you more about the charity?
Sure, I'd love to know more about them.
Well they are an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Oh that's cool, like schools?
Well it can be, but its more of children in general around the world.
Oh wow that's nice, what would an appropriate donation be?
Well any thing you can spare would be most welcomed, but we suggest that it be at least $2 to make a difference.
That's a bit steep for me, I think any donation amount would help honestly.

Sure, it just the recommended one. You can rest assured that Save the Children is a world renowned charity that strives to keep their costs low to ensure that the largest percentage possible goes to the children and our services.
If I choose to donate today where would my money go, specifically.
It would go towards the domestic and international programs and services that we provide.
Hmm, Okay. I'll donate ten cents
Well surely you can pare more than that.  The work we do helps to ensure children row up safe and free from harm.
I know but honestly money is tight, and I can't part with two dollars.
That is a shame, some poor starving kid in America will go to bed hungry, no worries.
Well, that's true, but that's why shelters exist.
Unfortunately there are a lot of kids out on the street and separted from their parnets.
Yeah I know it's really sad too, I just can't part with the money.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2)
I'll donate $0
Well thanks for nothing!
